examples.example: 当我打开门，看到外边阳光明媚，心情顿时格外舒畅。

translate.english: When I opened the door and saw that it was sunny outside, my mood suddenly became extremely pleasant.

examples.example: 我们一起去外边呼吸新鲜空气，享受美好的大自然吧。

translate.english: Let's go outside to breathe fresh air and enjoy the beautiful nature together.

examples.example: 我很喜欢在闲暇时到外边走走，感受这个世界的多彩与美好。

translate.english: I really like to go outside and walk around in my spare time to feel the colorfulness and beauty of this world.
